column4: Hi I got a big problem with ubuntu. I can#t get the desktop running anymore. At start up it says no screen found on my laptop. any help to get the desktop back without reinstall?

you can type 'sudo apt-get update && apt-get install xserver-xorg-core=1.0.2-0ubuntu10.4' to upgrade to the correct version (provided the mirror is upto date, else wait), or 'sudo apt-get install xserver-xorg-core=1.0.2-0ubuntu10' to downgrade
